title: Cell Culture
author: Opentrons
description: This robot allows the robot to perform cell culture and any similar assays.
process:
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
notes:
Reservoir setup
A1: media
A2: media + s


P300 tip rack 1 setup



P300 tip rack 2 setup

markdown.title: Cell Culture
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: This robot allows the robot to perform cell culture and any similar assays.
markdown.process:
1. Download your protocol.
2. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
3. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
4. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
5. Hit "Run".
markdown.notes:
* Reservoir setup
    * A1: media
    * A2: media + s
* P300 tip rack 1 setup
    * ![tip rack 1](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/cell_culture_microbial_discovery/tiprack_1_setup.png)
* P300 tip rack 2 setup
    * ![tip rack 2](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/cell_culture_microbial_discovery/tiprack_2_setup.png)
